title: Escape from Tenopia 4 Star System-Choose Your Own Adventure.pdf
description:
Escape from Tenopia #4 Star System Tenopia
Written by Richard Brightfield, Created by Edward Packard, Illustrated by David Perry

This is, pretty much, a Choose Your Own Adventure book; Created by Edward Packard, whom started the whole Choose Your Own Adventure series.  The big difference, is that while there are many paths/choices you can make, there is only one ending (The End), and you have to make all the right choices to get to it.

Some personal notes; While I was scanning in this book (Tenopia #4) I put too much pressure on the spine, trying to flatten it out for a good scan... chunks of the pages separated from the spine of this book, and there are a few pages where you can see the pages coming apart in the scan. I still did the best I could to scan in the entire book, but a few of the pages in this look funky (you can still read it just fine).  The book itself is nearly 28 years old...

Also, I renamed the file/torrent so that it'd fit in 64 characters (tpb's limit), and so it's been shortened to "Star System" instead of "Star System Tenopia"

Here's all the Tenopia books:
#1 Tenopia Island, by Edward Packard
#2 Trapped in the Sea Kingdom, by Richard Brightfield
#3 Terror on Kabran, by Richard Brightfield
#4 Star System Tenopia by Richard Brightfield	

Enjoy
